korean: 사흘에 한 끼도 못 먹은 듯하다
더워서 못 먹고 식어서 못 먹고
영감 밥은 누워 먹고 아들 밥은 앉아 먹고 딸의 밥은 서서 먹는다
내 것 잃고 내 함박 깨뜨린다
재물을 잃은 것은 작은 것을 잃은 것이고 벗을 잃은 것은 큰 것을 잃은 것이다
여자 셋이 모이면 새 접시를 뒤집어 놓는다
제 코가 석 자 가웃이나 빠졌다
책을 떠난 식자란 있을 수 없다
한 푼짜리 푸닥거리에 두부가 오 푼
눈앞에서 자랑 말고 뒤에서 꾸짖지 마라
절은 타도 빈대 죽는 게 시원하다
친정 가면 자루 아홉 가지고 온다
부엌에 가면 더 먹을까 방에 가면 더 먹을까
제게서 나온 말이 다시 제게 돌아간다
자식은 시집 장가 보내 봐야 안다
삶은 호박에 이 안 들 소리
개에게 된장 덩어리 지키게 하는 격
큰 고기는 잡아 제 망태기에 넣는다
정승 판서 사귀지 말고 제 입이나 잘 닦아라
여자가 한을 품으면 오뉴월에도 서리가 내린다
빚쟁이 발을 뻗고 잠을 못 잔다
헌 옷이 있어야 새 옷이 있다
찍자 찍자 하여도 차마 못 찍는다
남의 집 소경은 쓸어나 보는데 우리 집 소경은 쓸어도 못 본다
english: The early bird catches the worm.
Actions speak louder than words.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
Fortune favors the bold.
Honesty is the best policy.
Practice makes perfect.
Where there is a will, there is a way.
Rome was not built in a day.
All that glitters is not gold.
Better late than never.
Birds of a feather flock together.
Curiosity killed the cat.
Do not judge a book by its cover.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
A friend in need is a friend indeed.
The grass is always greener on the other side.
Haste makes waste.
Knowledge is power.
Laughter is the best medicine.
Money does not grow on trees.
No pain, no gain.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Beggars cannot be choosers.
Blood is thicker than water.
Cleanliness is next to godliness.
Do not cry over spilled milk.
Easy come, easy go.
The squeaky wheel gets the grease.
Two wrongs do not make a right.
A picture is worth a thousand words.
When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
You cannot make an omelet without breaking eggs.
The best things in life are free.
Still waters run deep.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
Do not bite the hand that feeds you.
If the shoe fits, wear it.
Jack of all trades, master of none.
Keep your friends close, your enemies closer.
Let sleeping dogs lie.
Necessity is the mother of invention.
Out of sight, out of mind.
People who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
The road to hell is paved with good intentions.
Slow and steady wins the race.
There is no smoke without fire.
Time heals all wounds.
Too many cooks spoil the broth.
You reap what you sow.
A stitch in time saves nine.
Charity begins at home.
Do not put all your eggs in one basket.
Familiarity breeds contempt.
Give credit where credit is due.
Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.
Ignorance is bliss.
If it is not broken, do not fix it.
Look before you leap.
Misery loves company.
Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
One good turn deserves another.
Prevention is better than cure.
Silence is golden.
The apple does not fall far from the tree.
The devil is in the details.
United we stand, divided we fall.
Variety is the spice of life.
Well begun is half done.
You cannot have your cake and eat it too.
A chain is only as strong as its weakest link.
A leopard cannot change its spots.
A watched pot never boils.
Barking dogs seldom bite.
Better safe than sorry.
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Empty vessels make the most noise.
First impressions are the most lasting.
God helps those who help themselves.
Half a loaf is better than none.
It takes two to tango.
Love is blind.
Many hands make light work.
Once bitten, twice shy.
Strike while the iron is hot.
The early bird gets the worm but the second mouse gets the cheese.
The truth shall set you free.
Time and tide wait for no man.
What goes around comes around.
Wisdom comes with age.
You can lead a horse to water but you cannot make it drink.
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
All good things must come to an end.
Every dog has its day.
Good things come to those who wait.
It is never too late to learn.
The only constant in life is change.
